title: simmonson
author: simmonson
content: We present our new exclusive product CryptoBet Gambling Software 2023 with a unique and innovative design. Create your own Cryptocurrency Casino with this very complete new gambling software that includes the Craps game, the Crash game, Roulette and an innovative slot.https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/cryptobet-gambling-software.pngLaunch your online cryptocurrency casino with this uniquely designed software with wonderful features to offer an amazing experience to its users. Get started right now.⏩Features-Free Support 24.-Anti-VPN protection.-User Authentication.-Fake Players.-Fake Chat Players.-Perfect Game Security.-Hot Wallet System.-Auto Withdrawls system.-Deposit & Withdrawl System (Coinbase, FaucetPay).-Users Tip (send users bits to each other).-HighChart User Stats.-Live User Chat.-Transaction History.-Game Hash History.-Auto Script Playing.-Front and light Admin + Simple Wallet Manager.-Database Manager.-Standard Game Rules (eg the coefficients of the numbers).-Easy modification Server Side Scripts.-Easy Install (Free Install).-Bootstrap & WebSocket.-Responsive Design (mobie, tablet).-Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency Wallet Manager.-Admin Manager.⏩Games-Crash Game.-Keno.-Roulette.-Limbo.-Dice.-Miner.-Wheel.-Hilo.⏩Requirements-OS: Linux or Windows (+SSH Access or terminal in windows).-HDD Space: You have 2 Options:-Using API Need 1 GB.-Using BTC Full Node Need 300 GB.-Node: v10x.-NPM: v6x.-Apache.-SSL.
